sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SOHAGEPOOR, a town and small district of Hindus- tan, in the province of Gundwana. The province is situ- ated between the 23° and 24° of N. lat. It is a barren, mountainous, and unproductive country, possessed by va- rious savage chiefs. The town is situated eighty miles S. by E. from Rewah. Long. 81. 45. E. Lat. 23. 29- N.
